name: Cat Clicker (itch) (Ghostrong)
description:
Click the cat to make more cats!

With cats you can buy upgrades.

And with upgrades you can have cats faster.

Try to unlock the last upgrade and check the little surprise!

Also feel free to comment, that's the first game i'm uploading so any criticism is welcome.

This game still don't have much content but i have some ideas and might update it.

Note: The game doesn't have a save system yet!
